title: Hour 3 - Chris Broussard
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Chris Broussard
description:
In hour 3, Chris Broussard joins to talk NBA, Kevin Durant free agent destination and Kyrie Irving to the Lakers possibly. And what will be the likely timeframe Donovan Mitchell & the Utah Jazz decide to part ways.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
